talent.name: Cleansing Reflections
talent.description:
Evaluation Basis: [Resonance Assessment 1514-G]

Resonator Jianxin experienced her Awakening 3 years ago. The Awakening was not triggered by any event and thus is observed as a Natural Awakening.

Resonator Jianxin's Tacet Mark is located on her left shoulder. Post-Awakening observations found no notable physical change.

Jianxin's Forte allows her to enhance her attacks by manipulating airflow and creating force fields. Evaluation revealed a strike velocity of 340m/s. Details regarding the force fields remain inconclusive. Overall, Jianxin's Forte exhibits potential for further development.

Resonator Jianxin's Resonance Spectrum Pattern has a 5% similarity to over 10 objects and no significant similarities above 20% have been found. The source of Awakening cannot be determined at this time.

Analysis of test samples has revealed a non-convergent Rabelle's Curve with a stable rise. Occasional fluctuations within normal range have been detected. Therefore, Jianxin is identified as a Natural Resonator.

combo_teaching.title: Jianxin: <color=#d4bf5f>Basic Attack</color> Tutorial
combo_teaching.description: Perform up to 4 attacks with vigorous martial arts, dealing <color=#46c3d4ff>Aero DMG</color>. <color=#f4d582>Normal Attacks</color> grant "Chi" on hit.

combo_teaching.title: Jianxin: <color=#d4bf5f>Mid-air Attack</color> Tutorial
combo_teaching.description: Consume STA to perform a plunging kick, dealing <color=#46c3d4ff>Aero DMG</color>.

combo_teaching.title: Jianxin: <color=#d4bf5f>Heavy Attack</color> Tutorial
combo_teaching.description: Consume STA to attack the target, dealing <color=Wind>Aero DMG</color>. Gain "Chi" on hit.

combo_teaching.title: Jianxin: <color=#d4bf5f>Resonance Skill</color> Tutorial
combo_teaching.description: Hold <color=Highlight>Resonance Skill</color> to take a stance and get ready to parry the enemy's next attack, and gain "Chi". If an enemy attack is parried, ignore the damage of that attack, counterattack to deal <color=#46c3d4ff>Aero DMG</color>, and gain "Chi". Interrupt the stance and launch an attack to deal <color=#46c3d4ff>Aero DMG</color> by releasing the Resonance Skill button, and gain "Chi".

combo_teaching.title: Jianxin: <color=#d4bf5f>Resonance Circuit</color> Tutorial
combo_teaching.description:
When "Chi" is stacked to its max, cast <color=Highlight>Heavy Attack</color> to start charging. Deal <color=Wind>Aero DMG</color> to a nearby area and gradually consume "Chi". For each stage progressed, gain a temporary shield and deal <color=Wind>Aero DMG</color>, progressing up to <color=Highlight>Major Zhoutian: Outer</color>. Release <color=Highlight>Basic Attack</color> to interrupt the charging, and cast an attack according to the current stage.
<color=Highlight>Prior to Minor Zhoutian</color>: Obtain a level-1 shield, and cast <color=Highlight>Pushing Punch</color>, dealing <color=Wind>Aero DMG</color> to enemies in front when the charging is interrupted.

combo_teaching.title: Jianxin: <color=#d4bf5f>Resonance Circuit</color> Tutorial
combo_teaching.description: <color=Highlight>Major Zhoutian: Outer</color>: Obtain a level-4 shield and cast <color=Highlight>Shock</color> to deal <color=Wind>Aero DMG</color> to the surrounding targets.

combo_teaching.title: Jianxin: <color=#d4bf5f>Resonance Liberation</color> Tutorial
combo_teaching.description: Create a strong wind field, continuously pulling targets within the field to the center and dealing <color=Wind>Aero DMG</color>. When the wind field disappears, deal <color=Wind>Aero DMG</color> to all targets within the range again.
